Name: Coffee Concepts
Review Text: Quite basic, but full. Coffee could be definitely better! 1 out of 5. Two ladies were absolutely unfriendly to their customers.

Name: Coffee Concepts
Review Text: Amazing and fresh sandwiches. The coffee is from the Belgian roaster Vascobelo.

Name: Coffee Concepts
Review Text: I love when you can ask someone who works in a food place 'what's good' and they give you a thoughtful answer. Sometimes when you're as indecisive as I can be, a little guidance can go a long way and the gentleman who served us here did â€¦

Name: Coffee Concepts
Review Text: This little coffee might have a good concept, however execution lacks in customer service. I went there only 2 times and will not go again soon. First time was greeted by strange looks and man serving coffee looked like I am bothering him â€¦

Name: Coffee Concepts
Review Text: I just bought a breakfast smoothy with inside 1 banana a tiny bit of oats and a little bit of protein. From this they only poored half in the cup and charged me â‚¬6.50 for it. Ridicilously overpriced. This experience is after they served chicken sandwiches to my colleagues at our office around the corner from which everyone got sick.

Name: Coffee Concepts
Review Text: Sandwiches are as good as they're written in reviews. Coffee is very fresh and staff is very friendly. I ll definitely try other branches as well

Name: Coffee Concepts
Review Text: The sandwiches are fine but they prioritize services like foodora and Deliveroo ahead of the customers in the shop. More than once Iâ€™ve waited 15 mins for a simple sandwich while there are 3 employees behind the counter with no one else in the store.

Name: Coffee Concepts
Review Text: Cute little coffeeshop the size of a walk-in wardrobe. The sandwiches and pastries are very good. If there is a queue you could wait a while.

Name: Coffee Concepts
Review Text: Wraps and sandwiches are Really good and people are very friendly and smiling. nice place to chill and have a coffee as well!

Name: Coffee Concepts

Review Text: My favourite coffee place in the area. The staff are amazing, coffee is great, recommended.
